application.doc: Renew a reverse proxy instance management certificate

param.name: id
param.doc: Name of the instance to act on, which is a unique name that identifies the instance

method.name: PUT
method.id: Renew Reverse Proxy Instance Management Certificate
method.doc: To renew the certificate which is used by WebSEAL when communicating with the Verify Identity Access policy server, issue an HTTP POST command on the Reverse Proxy resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: admin_id
param.doc: The Verify Identity Access administrator name

param.name: admin_pwd
param.doc: The Verify Identity Access administrator password

param.name: operation
param.doc: A flag that is used to indicate the operation to perform. This value is set to "renew" for the renew operation

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
